value:
$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|It's time to train legs. A few laps
up and down these dunes should
do the trick!$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|I hate to have to be the one to have
to tell you this, but I don't think you
understand what a vacation is.$k$pJust sit still and relax already!$k$p$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|I appreciate the fact that there are
activities other than swimming
available to us here...$k$pFrozen treats, drinking juice straight
from the fruit... I even saw someone
partaking of an oil massage...$k$p$nMPID_双界オルティナ|This paradise has so much
to offer. We've only just
scratched the surface!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_Swim22,Face|I wonder what that stall over
there is selling. Want to take
a closer look?$k$p$WmMPID_水着エリンシア,ch11_28_Erincia_F_Swim22,Face|Oh wow! Look at that dazzling display
of flowers... Let's go!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE10_01,0|$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|I'm spent, Dimitri. You're going to
have to go on without me. And keep
going...far, far away, preferably...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|We're hardly halfway through our
training session! You call yourself
the leader of the Golden Deer?$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|What does our being here have to
do with the Officers Academy?!$k$p$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|All your squabbling makes it entirely
impossible to relax. Of that I can
assure you.$k$pI have no choice but to call
in outside support.$k$p$nMPID_双界オルティナ|"Outside support"?$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|$Fi1500|There you are, Your Highness!
So, you want to ditch these other
house leaders and hang with us?$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|We've been looking forward to your
arrival ever since we heard you'd be
joining us this year!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|Oh! Sylvain, Ingrid... Thank you...
Yes! Let us not waste a moment
of this sunshine. Come!$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|Huh... I couldn't have pulled it off
any smoother myself. Thanks for
your help, Your Majesty.$k$p$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|I am happy to help. Now you're free
to enjoy some quiet time. As are we.$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|Don't mind if I do. A nice nap
in the sun is sounding real nice
right about now...$k$p$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|$nMPID_双界オルティナ|It seems we each enjoy time away
in our own personal way.$k$p$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|As one should.$k$pThis is a rare chance for people
from all over, and from every walk
of life, to enjoy time together.$k$pWe will all go our separate ways
one day, so should take advantage
of this...while we can.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|Aha! I've been looking all over for
you, Edie. I hope I'm not intruding!$k$p$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|On the contrary. Join us, and let's
enjoy this summer sun to its fullest!$k$p$Sbs150|
